commands.name: test
commands.description: Run tests in each packages. Runs `npm run test` for each package. Each package can have its own definition of `npm run test`

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Run lint in each packages. Runs `npm run lint` for each package if present.

commands.name: commitlint
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. This command invokes commitlint to ensure that the commit messages meet the conventional commit format

commands.name: build
commands.summary: Build all projects that haven't been built, or have changed since they were last built
commands.description: This command is similar to "rush rebuild", except that "rush build" performs an incremental build
